pages.title: Vault Gear Tiers
pages.text: Each $(#033dfc)Vault Gear Item$() has a certain $(#033dfc)tier$() associated with it that defines its $(#033dfc)attributes$(), there are in total $(#033dfc)3 different tiers$() that all vary with rolls, max repairs, levels and attributes.

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Tier 1$() is the first tier that you can get up until Vault Level 100. At $(#033dfc)Level 100$() you have a chance to roll $(#033dfc)Tier 2 Vault Gear$(), with higher base rolls, more levels and $(#033dfc)new attributes$(), however you may still roll Tier 1 Vault Gear.$(br)At $(#033dfc)Level 250$(), $(#033dfc)Tier 3 Gear$() is introduced, being the $(#033dfc)strongest$() and the most $(#033dfc)significant$() out of all, further increasing attributes and adding new ones.
